title: size-audit-helper Configuration
description: Records chunk sizes to be picked up by a build system as artifacts. The chunk sizes are monitored over time by the build system.

rushCommonDropDirectory.description: If the repository is using Rush, drop size-audit files under this directory under common.

secondaryDropDirectory.description: Optional path to a secondary directory where size audit files should be dropped.

assemblyLocaleToAnalyze.description: If specified, analyze this locale for assemblies if it exists.
